summary.Title: Solutions Architect – Japanese Speaking
summary.Presentation:
We’ve got intriguing problems. You have clever solutions. Apply today and let’s get to work.
About us
Queue-it is a tech scale-up that helps the world’s biggest brand

JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
We’ve got intriguing problems. You have clever solutions. Apply today and let’s get to work.

About us

Queue-it is a tech scale-up that helps the world’s biggest brands manage their busiest days. Our virtual waiting rooms prevent website crashes and bot abuse to create a smoother, fairer online experience for billions of users. At Queue-it, we are a diverse team coming from 50+ different countries with offices in Denmark, the U.S., and Australia.

About the role

As a Queue-it Solutions Architect, you’ll play a key role in our continued growth by providing technical recommendations to our enterprise-level customers, especially within our growing Japanese customer base. 

You’ll look under the hood of their web application architecture, figure out which technical/ business issues we can help them solve, and guide them through an ideal implementation of Queue-It.

Responsibilities

Provide technical guidance. Introduce customers to the product and its capabilities through demo and technical Q&A, and lead onboarding via product integration and optimization.

Investigate and communicate. Translate complex use cases and apply an in-depth understanding of various technology platforms and languages to prescribe and implement the best integration strategy.

Collaborate for success. Work with customers and external technology partners, as well as our full team to ensure successful delivery and integration of our product.

Qualifications

Ability to interface at all levels in an organization, particularly at the Executive level

Great troubleshooting and analytical skills

Project/self-management skills and proficiency in handling multiple customers and projects simultaneously

Excellent communication skills in English and native-level Japanese (Danish not required)

We are looking for someone with

10+ years of working experience with extensive web application development and/or architecture

In-depth knowledge of high-performance website optimization techniques commonly used in eCommerce platforms and/or ticketing software, such as CDN, caching, load balancing, etc.

Preferred candidates will have experience with

Large strategic enterprise clients and market leaders

Programming frameworks – JavaScript, .NET, JAVA, or PHP

eCommerce platforms, such as SAP Hybris, SalesForce, Magento, Shopify, etc. and/or ticketing technology

CDNs such as Akamai, Cloudflare and/or CloudFront

Why you'll love working with Queue-it

Continuous learning. You’ll develop the mindset and skills to navigate whatever comes next.

Success as defined by you. We’ll provide the tools and flexibility, so you can make a meaningful impact, your way.

Diverse and inclusive culture. You’ll be embraced for who you are and empowered to use your voice to help others find theirs. In a company with 50+ nationalities, you will be able to enjoy a truly intercultural and inclusive environment.

About the office

Located in the heart of Copenhagen, the Queue-it headquarters offers modern amenities, collaborative spaces, and quiet zones to suit all work styles – plus yoga, games, ping pong, foosball, PS4, social events, and great coffee, lunch, & snacks!

---

Apply today!

Please submit all materials in English

Due to GDPR regulations, we cannot accept applications/CVs via email. Please apply online to be considered.

Queue-it is committed to employing a diverse staff. Qualified applicants will receive consideration without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, age, sexual orientation, gender identity, gender expression, veteran status, or disability.

Department

Technical Engagement

Role

Solutions Architect

Locations

Copenhagen - DK

Employment type

Full-time

Language

English, Japanese
